title: Lilies For Love
description: Love, revenge, secrets, and murder in medieval England On the run from Lord Robert, the man who will stop at nothing to hide his secret, Janna takes refuge at Wiltune Abbey. While there, she desperately seeks to learn to read so she can uncover the truth about her unknown fatherâ€”but first there are mysteries to be solved. Who is the newcomer asking questions about Janna? Who stabbed Lord Hugh at St. Edith's fair? Was the knife meant for Janna, or will Hugh's friendship with the beautiful Emma have disastrous consequences for them all? All too soon it is time for the lilies to bloom, and for Janna to make her next move on the frightening path toward the truth.
author: Felicity Pulman
